_source.text: 7. Belize -- while I liked the cave tubing in Caves Branch, I found the Cayes (Amergris and Caulker, both of which I visited) unappealing (next time I may make it further out on to the reef, where the diving is better).

text: 7. Belize -- while I liked the cave tubing in Caves **Branch**, I found the Cayes (Amergris and Caulker, both of which I visited) unappealing (**next** time I may make it further out on to the reef, where the diving **is** **better**).
